hypothesis_content.title: BTC 4-Hour Bollinger Band Squeeze Breakout with Volume Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC enters a volatility compression phase (Bollinger Band Width < 0.02) on the 4-hour chart during a NEUTRAL regime, a breakout above the upper band with volume > 1.5x 20-period average will lead to a directional move of at least 3% in the breakout direction within the next 12 hours.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Volatility compression during neutral periods represents indecision. A high-volume breakout from this compression signals institutional participation and directional conviction, often preceding short-term trending moves.
entry_conditions: Price closes above upper Bollinger Band
Volume on breakout candle > 1.5x 20-period average volume

exit_conditions.take_profit: 3% price move from entry in breakout direction
exit_conditions.time_exit: 12 hours after entry if neither TP nor SL hit

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout occurs but price fails to sustain momentum, returning inside bands within 3 candles more than 60% of the time.
